channel.title: Can not connect to 127.0.0.1
channel.description:
Hello.. new dude here.. with other private server experience. I have this problem when trying to log in via, the web client and desktop client. This is my console error.
[03:15:51] Logging into (test, *****) [03:15:51] Your UID is: 38657567 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:53327 [b][size=10pt]Did not save for test[/size][/b] Server: ClientHandler: Client test disconnected.
127.0.0.1 seems to hate me.. :P (moparscape is on the trusted list of my firewall)

item.title: Can not connect to 127.0.0.1
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

Don’t you need to have a source running? lol

Read full topic

He is using moparscape client… You hit run server then you login ^

item.title: Can not connect to 127.0.0.1
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

[quote=“00G00, post:4, topic:244937”]I clicked the “start server” button… I never set-up for any online server…
localhost does not work.

I have ports 28000-28030
for another game, doubt that would interfere w/ moparscape though.

EDIT: found this right after clicking the start server button.

Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

I do not use ports 43594[/quote] are u using silab client??? the moparscape client may not support you server source prolly cuz its silab so client.silabsoft.org <— link

Read full topic
